types.name: published
types.description: Whether or not the user published an application

types.name: applicationType
types.description: The type of application being published

types.name: errorCode
types.description: The error code associated with an operation

types.name: initialPublish
types.description: Whether this was the initial publish or a republish

types.name: defaultConfiguration
types.description: Whether or not the default configuration values were used. False if at least one value was adjusted

types.name: recommendedTarget
types.description: Whether or not the recommended deployment target was used (initial publish only)

types.name: recipeId
types.description: The recipe used for the deployment

types.name: isGeneratedProject
types.description: Whether or not the referenced project was generated

types.name: publishSettingType
types.description: The type of a particular configuration setting/detail

types.name: publishInstallCliMode
types.description: The operation that occurred when an attempt was made to download the CLI

types.name: publishSetupStage
types.description: Represents a phase of the publish experience startup sequence

metrics.name: auth_signInToAmazonQDialogOpened
metrics.description: Called when the Amazon Q sign in dialog is opened

metrics.name: auth_signInToAmazonQDialogClosed
metrics.description: Called when the Amazon Q sign in dialog is closed

metrics.name: amazonq_closeChat
metrics.description: When Amazon Q chat panel is closed

metrics.name: amazonq_openChat
metrics.description: When users open Amazon Q chat panel

metrics.name: serverlessapplication_deploy
metrics.description: Called when deploying a Serverless Application Project

metrics.name: serverlessapplication_publishWizard
metrics.description: Called when user completes a Serverless Application publish wizard

metrics.name: codeartifact_credentialsRequest
metrics.description: Called when Visual Studio requests credentials from the Toolkit in order to communicate with a CodeArtifact package repository

metrics.name: codeartifact_getRepoUrl
metrics.description: Called when user selects a profile

metrics.name: codeartifact_setRepoCredentialProfile
metrics.description: Called when user get an endpoint url

metrics.name: publish_start
metrics.description: Called when user starts the Publish to AWS workflow

metrics.name: publish_end
metrics.description: Called when user exits the Publish to AWS workflow

metrics.name: publish_deploy
metrics.description: Called when user publishes the project

metrics.name: publish_setup
metrics.description: Starting the Publish to AWS experience

metrics.name: publish_unsupportedSetting
metrics.description: Called when user exits the publish workflow to record unsupported setting types

metrics.name: lambda_iamRoleCleanup
metrics.description: Called when cleaning up IAM Role trusted policy

metrics.name: lambda_addEvent
metrics.description: Called when adding an event to a lambda function
